text: (I don't know why I said it like that.)
(I'm sure, you don't want to do this... with me.)

(On the contrary, what if the two of them
continued like this... and quit being idols.)

One, two, three, four!
One, two, three, four!

Yes, that's it!
Mano...! Wow, you're getting better!

Howa...
It's all thanks to your advice, Meguru-chan...

...But I'm really sorry Meguru-chan.
Even though you have to do club activities too...

No, not at all!
I want to help Mano get stronger too!

....The truth is, like Hiori said.
I have to work hard on my own...

Otherwise... I'll never be able to
properly catch up with the two of you...

I think the three of us are in this together,
and I'm sure Hiori felt the same way too.

Yeah
...It's weird for me to say that on my own.

I think,
Hiori always has Illumine's best interest at heart.

I have to be able to do it properly to
respond to Hiori-chan's feelings...
